DON’T BE A NAUGHTY USER

DON’T BE A NAUGHTY USER

At Shuga, we constantly strive to give you the best rewards we can in the most fun way. We can only do this by maintaining the integrity of this platform at the highest possible level. So here are a few game rules you will need to adhere to in order to participate in Shuga High. Should any winners be found violating our house rules, prizes will be forfeited and we will not entertain any negotiation.

UPLOADING RECEIPTS

Uploading a non-partner merchant’s receipts gives you the most Candies with the least effort. Here are a few strict rules you need to know:

1. Tampering – Do not try to fold or cover part of the receipt or put multiple different receipts together to look like one receipt.

2. Modifying – Do not attempt to change any of the values printed on receipts. This includes (i) writing over the values and (ii) digitally editing the values.

3. Fabricating – Do not attempt to use any software to create a non-genuine receipt.

4. Using someone else’s receipt – Do not pass around and recycle receipts among friends.

5. Receipts from your establishment – If you work in that establishment, do not attempt to repeatedly submit unclaimed receipts.

6.Receipts and invoices from business dealings – Candies granted from such invoices will forfeited.
Summary: Only upload receipts obtained from your own personal shopping. Be it a new car, a canned drink or a receipt from the hair salon, we accept it all.

PICKING UP CANDIES

Picking up Candies spawned globally can be very fun but it is time-consuming. That said, please make sure you adhere to this one rule:

Do not attempt to install any 3rd party software to spoof locations in order to pick up Candies.

OUR RESPONSIBILITY – Candies granted from such invoices will forfeited.
Summary: Only upload receipts obtained from your own personal shopping. Be it a new car, a canned drink or a receipt from the hair salon, we accept it all.

How do we do that? – Candies are normally credited instantly after a receipt is uploaded or after a Candie has been picked up. After the result of the draw is announced, our backend system automatically scans through all the Candies used to participate. Should the system flag any unusual activity and we deem it a violation of our rules as set forth above, we will email you the proof of the violation, you will forfeit your prizes and the decision will be final. Forfeited prizes will be snowballed to the next draw.

Thank you!
If you are reading this, you must fully understand that we want you winning fair. Turn your everyday receipts – which were only good for the bin prior to Shuga High – into Candies that can win you thousands of dollars’ worth of prizes!

Have fun winning!
